website_summaries.verdict: A small outdoor unit that's not spacious enough for large items. Though the walls and floor are rugged, additional materials (like bricks) may be needed to prevent wobbling.
pros: Doubled-walled build w/durable flooring for added protection of your tools and supplies
Slim design (53 cubic ft.) works well in small yards
cons: The plastic has the tendency to warp over time
It's wobbly, and some owners find the need to brace it with bricks or other items

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This shed is perfect! It’s my “she shed”. Nice size, reasonably sturdy and not to bad putting together. You definitely need 2 people when you get to the roof. Whoever says it only takes about an hour to put together is smoking something! It was a good 3-4 hours with able engineers assembling and good tools. Of course we (well my husband) reads all the directions. Take your time when you get to the roof, all the rest is very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Aliceperry

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Roof warped in just a few summer months and now the door won't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In short it's a complete piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: We hadn't had this four months before it completely fell apart. It's even sitting on a level concrete pad. The roof warped almost immediately, and no amount of help will keep the doors on. In short it's a complete piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sturdy Storage shed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I needed the width 5ft and length or depth 6 ft and I found my dimensions from Rubbermaid. Now, it was very easy to put together, i believe one can do it under and hour. One thing that need to be taken care is the level. You need almost perfect level where you assembling or plan to put this shed otherwise you will have problems with door closing. The thing Rubbermaid could have done better is the doors. Door keeps coming out. But I found a solution on Youtube about the doors. So its all good now. I will recommend this shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_me

customer_reviews.title: Not for windy conditions
customer_reviews.text: The shed was good until the day we had high winds. Storage shed not made for outside weather conditions. (Winds).The shed hit the deck and broke a step and landed about 15 feet were it was erected.
customer_reviews.author: dianna morange

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware.
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived damaged and 4 hours ahead of scheduled delivery time. Had to scramble when the truck pulled up. All the panels seem ok, but the hardware and instruction manual were not included. Called Rubbermaid Customer support and am now waiting 7-10 business days. UPDATE** Dropped rating from 2 stars to 1. 2 weeks later I received an envelope with screws only. Still no door handles, door lock hasp, roof pins and accessory bracket. Not sure what the breakdown is but I wish Rubbermaid would get it together. I basically purchased plastic panels. Stay away from this product!
customer_reviews.author: MJ2005

customer_reviews.title: I am loving this shed!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and easy to put together. Perfect for the backyard and weathers the rain well! I am 65 year old woman and was able to put this together by myself. There are not gaps in doors and joint that are found in similar sheds by other competitors. It does not have shelving but I put in some Metro Shelving (on wheels) and it houses all my poultry supplies out by my chicken coop. In my experience it is much better than other plastic sheds out there. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Hawke

customer_reviews.title: missing all the hardware and some of the panels
customer_reviews.text: Just opened sealed box. Single box delivery. When examined all the hardware and some of the panels were not included. Went back to the purchase page and found a notice saying currently unavailable. Totally unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Best she’d ever!
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased and assembled several sheds before. First for Rubbermaid. This was the best kit I ever had. All parts neatly assembled. Outstanding instructions and excellent materials and reinforcements. This will be the only brand I buy from now on. Strongly recommend this kit!,
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty sturdy enough for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. I finally put this together yesterday. A friend build a small platform with 2x6s for a base and attached the flooring. Cost for base was about $40. I am a 5'3" woman and was able to put the rest together myself in a couple of hours including the roof. The doors aligned perfectly. Plenty sturdy enough for what I need. Will let you know how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: amj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a Well cover
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this as a well cover, mainly because I added a filter and the fake rock no longer fit. Also I hated lifting the 'rock' to access the well for maintenance or periodic checks. This was perfect: NOT hard to put together. Yes it has 100+ screws mainly for the floor and roof, but most plastic sheds are not solely snap together. If you've put together one of those metal sheds (like 500 screws), this is easier by any comparison. Yes, I cut out the bottom, but good luck finding a bottomless plastic shed. Small, compact, large openings (roof and doors), sturdy... everything I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately the left door doesn't stay on unless it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the left door doesn't stay on unless it is jammed in. I read this in a couple of the reviews but anticipated that wouldn't be the case for my shed. Please let me know what we can do or if you can send a new door? I don't really see where a piece is missing to hold it in tact. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle A.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have five thumbs on each hand, but I have a friendly neighbor who is handy and very good at projects of this nature. With his help the unit was assembled and in place in less than an hour, Now I have some much needed storage space at a very reasonable price. The furnished instructions were easy to follow, and made assembly quick and easy. Follow them step by step, and you'll be done quickly .It is obvious that the unit is well designed, and will last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Oldiebutgoodie

customer_reviews.title: It stores stuff
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly difficult to assemble. Probably took a friend and I about 3 hours. You definitely need a second set of hands. Make sure you have this thing on level ground or the pieces won't fit together very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shed.  Maybe purchase from another source.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shed based upon color. (My local big box store had the same shed for the same price instock just in a different color) When the product arrived by freight it was missing the box with all the wall connectors and hardware. Rubbermaid makes you contact them directly to "fix" any problems. It has been over a month and still no wall connectors. The times i have called Rubbermaid I am usually on hold for 20 to 30 minutes before speaking to a person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super little shed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size shed, perfect for housing garden tools! It went together in approximately 90 minutes, and looks great against the house. It's a nice color that works well with our home's siding color (linen), especially considering most of the sheds available on the market lean more to the greys and browns in color. It stands just above our 6' fence line, but only at the very peak, so the neighbors say they can't see it even though their yard is at a slightly higher elevation than ours (Our shed stands 10' from the fence line). I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: CAFirst

customer_reviews.title: The vinyl/plastic material does not withstand the sun
customer_reviews.text: The roof has warped due to the sun and the doors no longer stay in place. I will have to modify the structure to bring the roof top in line so the door tabs will stay in place. The previous Rubbermaid storage shed lasted 10+ years. This seems to be junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Malherb

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality from a Name Brand
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions could have been clearer, but the process is straightforward. All the pieces went together smoothly. Directions suggest two people for assembly, but I managed it on my own with little difficulty. The completed unit is quite sturdy and holds all my garden tools but for the mover. Still a bit pricey for some plastic panels that snap together.
customer_reviews.author: George Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Great little shed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy little shed with ample room to store my gardening gear. It is sturdy and seems to be rock solid on top of the foundation that I made from pressure treated lumber. I was able to assemble it by myself, although I did need to use a step ladder to prop the sides up. There are some small gaps around the top which I filled with silicone to keep the spiders out. This shed accepts Rubbermaid shed accessories, they slot into the back/sides very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Tom AE

customer_reviews.title: Took my time, and happy
customer_reviews.text: I put this together without rushing the job and I think that is key. Did I assemble it on a billiard-smooth level area? Nope. But I did find fairly level ground, and we don't experience hurricanes much where i live. Filled it with a snowblower and a push Briggs&Stratton mower and various yard tools to free up space in my diminutive garage. I'm satisfied, 'nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Bozo McTavish

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality structure and materials
customer_reviews.text: As one can see from the images these so called sturdy sheds start to warp almost within the 60-90 days and they just get to a point where they no longer are able to support the needed rigidity to hold the swing-out doors in their above slots resulting into a complete compromise of safety and of the structure.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. I did it within an hour by myself and I am a girl. Looks sturdy but we will see how it stands up to brutal Texas sun and heat.
customer_reviews.author: PJB

customer_reviews.title: Wind Resistant
customer_reviews.text: My son and I put down a cement foundation using 12"X 1.5" step pads from Home Depot and put together the Rubbermaid storage shed. I quickly filled the shed about 50% full. My wife likes it as well as a neighbor and I find it very useful. The slide back roof is really handy. Highly recommend. Hurricane Laura passed west of us by less that 100 miles and we had winds from 44-48 from midnight till dawn. This is a picture of the shed AFTER Hurricane Laura passed through! No damage whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Scafidel

customer_reviews.title: Great shed.  Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the shed overall. Easy to assemble although a couple of pieces were warped due to heat. Not an issue as the pieces bent into place with only a little effort. Another review indicated their shed leaked. We have only had a couple of rainy days since I assembled the shed and its holding up great. Perfect size for what we needed and commercial plastic storage bins fit in nicely without a lot of wasted space.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Storage Piece
customer_reviews.text: This product came in damaged. Update: I ordered three more for storage at our mountain home and have changed my rating to five stars. Great product, easy to assemble with sufficient storage for our lawn tools. Due to being on a severe slope, the sizes were perfect as we had minimal room for a larger single unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dngreen51

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value item, local big box stores charged more and the delivery was outrageous. I was able to put it together by myself in about two hours with only a hammer, screwdriver, and cordless drill, to my boyfriends amazement. There's 3parts to the floor, walls and roof, and 2 parts to the back wall and doors. Mostly clips together with big brackets and you screw the roof and bottom down. Much bigger than I expected too. Very pleased with this product looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid makes good stuff; we all know that and the only ...
customer_reviews.text: Rubbermaid makes good stuff; we all know that and the only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that it is virtually impossible to put 3 bicycles in there. We have 2 in there and it is all that will go. Still though for the price you can't get storage which is easy to build and will hold up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Willson

customer_reviews.title: House For My Riding Mower
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried after seeing the box when delivered. In rough shape is an understatement but it was packaged well and no damage was done. Assembly was somewhat easy, illustrations were not the best. Allow a couple hours assembly due mainly to the number of screws you have to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this storage shed was very easy to assemble (about an hour) with minimal tools and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Long story here....this storage shed was very easy to assemble (about an hour) with minimal tools and looks good. The door latch is a bit flimsy but capable. I bought this to replace a Keter that I had been waiting 4 months for parts for and it was nice to have everything in the package so that I could complete the assembly. Anyway it is in service and lets see how it survives the tough SW Florida sun!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Our perfect storage solution.
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered to our home just as expected. Was easy to put together for us two senior citizens. It will hold everything we wanted it too and we were able to cut up the cardboard to recycle it. There were no staples in the packaging which we find hard to deal with. Just heavy duty plastic straps and the packaging came off easily. Instructions were good too. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5-star
customer_reviews.text: The shed is very easy to put together if you read the instructions carefully. It took me and my sister two hours to assemble it. Youll need a ladder or step stool if you are short... like us. The only thing i don't really like is that the screws that come with it are too short in my opinion especially when you are trying to secure the walls to the floor. I dont know how much the screws are helping with that because i dont think they are long enough to attach the walls to the floor. Make sure you level your pad otherwise it will be very hard to square up the shed.
customer_reviews.author: K Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as we thought
customer_reviews.text: This shed is OK for the money. We really thought it would be much sturdier. Hope it holds up in the wind and rain. It took a few hours to put together but the directions were pretty clear. Wasn't pleased with delivery. They were supposed to call the day before and the morning of to confirm, but did not. They arrived and were asked to put the package in the back yard but refused and plopped it in the living room. We had to take the pieces out and move them to the backyard. It looks great and the roof slides easily and will be beneficial to our needs.
customer_reviews.author: shamar

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Sliding Top Shed
customer_reviews.text: The sliding top shed was just what we needed. It fitted in with our Homeowner's rules as the height was below a standard fence line. Big enough for a tractor mower, regular push mowers or a small ATC. Brilliant and will be purchasing another to house my daughters' bicycles. We are very pleased and the color matches nicely with the vinyl siding on our house. Easy to construct in a couple of hours after creating a nice, level base. For this we used Paver patio squares and a couple of inches of AA paver base.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Morning

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, EFFICIENT, ACCOMMODATING
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for our needs! It holds more than I realized--I use it at my daycare center for storage of holiday decorations, gardening tools, extra toys, and documents that must be kept for a time before shredding. It's pretty and efficient and I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: V. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, but product is a very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, but product is a very flimsy. The doors have marks on them that are not part of the grain. First day we set it up we had heavy rain and it leaked inside. We have two horizontal Rubbermaid sheds and they are great. I don't think this shed will last long.
customer_reviews.author: busybee

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality doors.
customer_reviews.text: My main gripe is with the shed doors. They went on fine but right away I noticed the right door was semi warped. The top of right door was not flush so will let water in. A week later both doors are bent outward, so now the shed contents are unprotected. My assumption is very cheap material. This is my second shed of exact same model I bought 3 yrs ago. The first one had a similar right door issue but it happened a year later and it was not that bad but this newer one is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend an alternative shed
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together was quite the experience. Bottom line, the shed does the job. Took about 3 hours to put together. Smaller than I would have preferred. I have had the SunCast sliding top shed in the past which I like significantly more than this and provides much more room. I would recommend that anyone interested in this shed go with the SunCast sliding top shed. And no, I am not a rep for SunCast. It was just a significantly better shed in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice shed for Arizona
customer_reviews.text: We needed a shed made out of resin to deal with our weather in AZ. This shed seems like it should hold up better than metal or wood. We just followed the directions and the shed went together nicely. It is an adequate size for what we needed. We will see how it holds up as time goes by. I'm a little worried about heavy rain as there were several holes here and there where rain could get in. My husband sealed the holes as best he could so we will see. In the end it looks great and is storing all the things we wanted to store and more, so we would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The package had looked open before ad the were large dirty men's boot prints on the inside of the lid of the box. As a women who wears a men's size 4 they were not mine. The package was also missing a few pieces , half of the parts needed to hold the walls together(3/6). Instructions were a bit confusing at points but I managed to build it by myself as a 5' person.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It went together like a lego project
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with no damage to the shipping container. It went together like a lego project. However, the right hand door fell off twice before we tied it down with cables. The little knob which went into the roof part was already showing damage, and wouldn't stay on unless the door was closed and latched.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loose Doors
customer_reviews.text: After extensive lengths to establish a level base- assembled unit. which was rather simple, the doors disengage from the sockets easily. Also, the center fit for the lock/ latch doesn't connect without pressing door inward so as to match the "warp" of the right door. Granted it is plastic, but the doors should be designed to stay intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice but not very sturdy. The side walls should have a metal brace like the back wall. We purchased this building for our pool equipment storage so we put metal racks inside & screwed them to the side walls for support. Hoping this building last awhile for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Robichaux

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product, easy to assemble, worth the money, hope will last for long, the delivery was a big disappointment, the package was quickly delivered to a final destination and was sitting at the carrier for more then a week and it’s within 2 miles, doesn’t make any sense and amazon reps helpless
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: THis is perfect for what we needed in our yard. It is below the fence-line, so no need for HOA approval for installation. We placed it on top of flat concrete pavers, on top of sand (for more even ground). It came out great. Installation was pretty straight forward. It was easier to put together with an extra set of hands. It fits our lawnmower, weed-eater, blower, gardening equipment, and we still have room!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Better than good shed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install as long as you dont flow confusing instructions. YOU MUST HAVE A 99% LEVELED SURFACE TO PLACE THIS SHED! If not leveled, doors will not open or close and will fall off hinges. This is not a burglar proof shed, all plastic including lock latch assembly. Other wises, good shed.
customer_reviews.author: Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It went together. The roof really isn't attached with the screws. It will come off. They sides are only sitting in the grooves not locked in. Since it has been raining for over a month in New England. It sat for a bit. Water got into the panels. So they aren't sealed. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Same size screws all around! Must be on a flat surface. Check panels all around before roof installation. Two people 2hrs, easy to do. Youtube video available & helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing to make sure of in the beginning is that the surface you are placing the shed on is absolutely flat. Once we did that, two adults were able to put the shed together in about 2 hours. We placed the shed in a fairly protected area. We had a windstorm the next week and the shed did not shift.
customer_reviews.author: Gardengirl

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bigger project than I thought as had to make a level base out of wood and only one person to put it together. I made a wooden cage for the inside to hold my tools and put up a pegboard. Nice looking shed and quickly filled it up.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Spurs

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The doors were warped and keep falling of. Not like you can ship it back...learned my lesson. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie c

customer_reviews.title: NO Directions or hardware included!
customer_reviews.text: The box was so beat up with wrapped in plastic, dented. Their was NO hardware or directions!! I need them ASAP. I was able to put shed together but I need front pieces so it can close and i can put a lock on it. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really very happy with this shed! One word of caution, the floor is very flexible so make sure it’s on a very strong, flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Nice shed!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble the shed in just a few hours. The instructions were pretty straight forward and it didn’t become too difficult until the roof assembly when I needed a little bit of help to get everything lined up. I really like the additional Rubbermaid accessories such as the shelves, hooks, and basket since they add storage capacity and would recommend them to someone considering this purchase. The color was very sharp and this fit nicely under our deck.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingV

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't feel as sturdy as I thought it would be. That's not that important to me. It's in a patio and will not have any wind to deal with. Very easy to assemble. (as long as you follow the instructions) I had it ready in less than 45 minutes, by myself. Overall I would recomend it for garden tools or anything you need to store around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Evi

customer_reviews.title: you need two people to work on & magnetic screwdriver
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely hard for me to put together but eventually I got it done. I don't like that the screws for the roof metal did not have nuts nor can you buy nuts for this screw. You must put soap on the plastic to put the sections together. I think the design could be improved on immensely. Get all done and not easy to put a lock on this. Don't know how I'm going to lock the thing. The directions were a bit miserable. This could be improved on a great deal. Just have one set and make it easier for people to understand.
customer_reviews.author: sheila lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: If you take your time and READ the instructions; it comes together very quickly with two people. Do not use a drill on high power, back off the clutch to "1" - "2". The flatter your foundation the better your unit will be square. All in all, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bndtech

customer_reviews.title: What Every Homeowner Needs
customer_reviews.text: The Rubbermaid garden shed is a great addition to any home with garden implements to store. So, when we ran out of space in our first shed, we had no hesitancy in buying a second one. My only complaint is that it took so long to receive it through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Earl S. Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my pool noodles and floats in. You really need to have 2 people to put this together and not all tools are provided. It took me about 30-45 minutes to put together. Make sure to have a magnetic hand screw driver available as putting the screws in the back of the roof was hard to do as the screw is short.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Was not a brand new product
customer_reviews.text: The product that arrived was definitely a return from another customer, box was opened and parts were missing. The biggest give away was there were already big holes where one should drill if the product was new. It’s a hassle to return since it’s a very big box and was a production for it to get it delivered in the first place. Could have been a good product but Not happy with this experience.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with the quality of the shed. It looks great and is very easy to assemble. It is a two person project and can not be done by one person. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: K Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value for nice storage unit with fast free delivery too!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice storage unit, my handyman put it together by himself in about 3 hours, he said it was easy for one person to put together. All parts clearly labeled and enclosed, very sturdy storage unit that fit perfectly in the space I had, looks nice adjacent to my patio. No shelves which would have been nice, but I bought a sturdy shelf unit and it fit with room to spare for my tall yard tools. Made in the USA which is a huge plus for me. Good quality and value for nice storage unit with fast free delivery too, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: bertascv

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The shed is awesome. When they say a level surface is needed, they really mean level. Mine is on a black top but apparently a bit sloped. Therefore I leveled it with the box the shed came in but eventually will buy shins for it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Good Product Although a Little Pricey
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged so I probably should have refused the delivery because I discovered there were no assembly instructions or screws enclosed so 4 stars instead of 5 due to the packaging. Might even be other parts missing and I have one part left over that I don't know quite what to do with. Despite having no instructions to follow, it wasn't too hard to put together although a taller person or two people would have had an easier task. All in all, the storage shed will work well for its intended use .
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Lover

customer_reviews.title: cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: This shed is garbage. The front roof portion sags and then it won't slide back. To get access to the shed I have to climb in and lift the back portion of the front lid up so that it clears the front of the back section of the roof. Super frustrating. Every single time. Apparently 2 months in the florida sun was too much for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This Rubbermaid outside container took us 4 hours to build. Instructions were ok. The only difficult thing was it came in a 200+ LB box on a pallet. We needed to open the box and take the individual items out and carry them to the backyard. We definitely needed this unit for storage...it works well and lockable. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: We love this product!! Great for all your storage needs. It will never rust. Very durable . Great size also 7x7
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very good Product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, reliable, water proof... no complains after 2 years. I was going to buy a second one but the price has increase significantly. Unfortunately will have to look for other alternatives
customer_reviews.author: e-client

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This really was pretty easy to build. It seems it could be a little thicker to help others a bit sturdier but all in all we are very pleased and would recommend it to our friends .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: A little harder than expected to assemble, but very happy with the quality. I like the accessories that you can purchase additionally (hooks, baskets, etc)
customer_reviews.author: April Donnellan

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back prior to opening
customer_reviews.text: This product had a price on Amazon about $400.00 less than the price from VM Innovations. Due to this it was returned. I did want to give a HUGE SHOUT OUT to several customer service reps. at VM as our return had gone AWOL for 2 weeks. The folks who did an outstanding job at VM were McKenzie, Brogan, Terrice, Jacqueline and Keith. I hope VM values these employees as they are all patient and made a difficult experience quite tolerable !!! Thank You all.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: More like 4.5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. Just wish the roof would slide back easier. The one peice that is desgined for it to slide on was a giant pain to get on, and I'm positive had I gotten it on perfect then this would have been a non issue. (If you've tried and succeed you are a more patient person than I). The rest of the product was super easy to assemble and short of screwing the roof down I was able to complete it by myself. (Having someone press down on the roof as you screw it to the walls makes it so much easier).
customer_reviews.author: Java9

customer_reviews.title: Garden Shed
customer_reviews.text: This shed can be constructed without using a lot of muscle. Most things went together well except the rear roof panel. Once finished we've been able to store all our garden tools and walk behind lawn mower. I'd probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for below the fence!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is perfect for hiding behind a standard privacy fence. Its quite easy to put together if directions are followed. Some directions may be missing or unclear but if using pictures from sheet you will be fine. Put this together alone in a few hours. Sturdy, strong, roomy and love the slide top with lock.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the quality of the shed. Seems a bit flimsy. Floor was very thin. I have purchased Rubbermaid sheds before and the quality was much better. Hoping to get two years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: VitoSM

customer_reviews.title: Good shed seems sturdy enough but a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Received the 5x2 one earlier this week. My 10 year old son and I was able to put it together in 1-2hrs it was very easy. Looks good and it definitely is serving the purpose I got it 4. No parts missing or anything. Had 2 spare screws left over...
customer_reviews.author: Phil V

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LITTLE SHED
customer_reviews.text: I USE IT FOR MY FIRE WOOD FOR MY WOOD BURNING INSERT. IT HOLDS QUITE A BIT AND KEEPS THE WOOD DRY THRU RAIN AND SNOW! OF COURSE YOU CAN USE IT FOR ANYTHING BUT IT SURE IS HANDY FOR MY FIREWOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Instruction book was easy to understand. I probably could have put it together if I lost the book. Took me no time at all. Very nice unit. Delivered today at 11:00, assembled at 1:00, with no help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It took only a couple hours. You need a second person just to hold it in place while assembling certain parts, but can be done mostly by one person. I previously assembled a metal shed, which took half a day and required 2 people working on it.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Great storage shed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put this together pretty quickly. We wanted some extra storage on the side of our yard and this was perfect size. Instructions were very clear and all parts marked accordingly. Has already withstood some rainstorms this last week with no water leaking so we are happy. We’ll be adding more items in there from garage very soon. Great storage shed would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a Vespa and a Lambretta !
customer_reviews.text: This shed can fit two vintage Italian motor scooters. It’s cozy, but for those with limited space, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today was easy to assemble but the screws attaching roof to walls there was not enough space to get fingers in to steady screw. Creative with needle nose pliers to steady screw until it caught. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took my wife and I about two hours to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Took my wife and I about two hours to assemble the shed. You can't really see if the holes between the roof and sides line up correctly before tightening the screws. Mounted the shed on 4X4's to keep it off the ground and level. So far seems to keep the rain out.
customer_reviews.author: ptcga75

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and to take apart
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this Rubbermaid outdoor shed, we had another Rubbermaid shed (almost 15 years). The previous shed and this shed are very similar in appearance. The previous shed had no screws or nails. It was easy to put together and to take apart. Though this shed has parts which do not require screws, bolts and other hardware, it has hardware. Putting the roof together was not easy. There were holes for the screws on one side, but there was no connection (holes) on the other side. So, the screws cut in to the plastic roof. Would I recommend this product to someone else? No. We were a bit disappointed. We do like its look, though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Brister

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: There is a step by step video on youtube, I bought it with the easy 5 month payment plan from Amazon. Worth every penny. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The shed is exactly how it was described! It is roomy, unassuming and easy to asseble. I hope it holds up in the heat the way it did with heavy rain and wind. I also hope it last a long time because it was not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Company needs to check product before shipping
customer_reviews.text: I received the item I ordered without any problems but, when I started putting it together I found 1 inside panel had a complete hole in it which was also visible on the outside. I do not know if the company sent it that way or not but I have it put together and I’m not about to take it apart just for 1 left side wall. It’s a very good looking shed and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: freddie h.

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: A traditional padlock is too thick to fit in the hole. We had to make the hole a little bigger. The shed went together with ease. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jillIdaho

customer_reviews.title: NOT an easy assembly but should work well.
customer_reviews.text: I hired 2 handymen to lay a slab with sand and pavers, and then assemble this shed. Glad I did not tackle it myself as there are a lot of screws to use. It does not just snap together. Took them about 2 hours to properly assemble. It arrived in a huge heavy box but well protected with plastic over the outside of box. The local delivery company actually delivered it on time. It looks very attractive and just hope it keeps all items inside dry.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Just what I neede
customer_reviews.text: This shed is just what I needed to get some stuff stored outside of my garage. Having said that- I don't know that I would ever pay that much money for a puzzle piece shed again.
customer_reviews.author: VJC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shed!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this shed! I put it together by myself in less than two hours without much difficulty. Holds quite a bit of stuff and I would recommend some of the Rubbermaid shed accessories to maximize your storage capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid she’d..Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Product instruction were pretty good, took about 1.5 hours to assembly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: The shed feels like a house of cards. I put down a pager foundation and that did not mitigate the issue. I should have gone metal or stick built for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frye

customer_reviews.title: Not made for outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: We put the shed up recently and within one month, both doors broke off. Because of the way the product is made, we cannot even repairs the doors to work. The shed is now useless
customer_reviews.author: 1LTACURB

customer_reviews.title: Totally waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I love this shed, perfect for my patio cushions and patio tools, such as my clippers, table fans, lights I also put in shelving inside to place an outdoor TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last year at Lowes (paid a little less). I wanted another one that matched and the new models at Lowes were a different color. I'm glad Amazon had the same one. It took my husband and I less than 2 hours to assemble it in the dusk-dark.
customer_reviews.author: Neva

customer_reviews.title: Great shed
customer_reviews.text: Great storage shed. Installed on patio with slight slope and still functions fine. Can't figure out how to use accessories and instructions mentioned nothing for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tara C Conley

customer_reviews.title: Quite big and stable but without shelves
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. The plastic walls click into each other and are tightened with screws. The only downside is that it comes without any shelves. There are some mounting screws that could be used but no shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our yard tools. Delivery was a little rough, but love the shed. Standing next to side of a tough shed. For visual size
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Had to refuse delivery
customer_reviews.text: Our HOA did not approve the shed - wrong for location. Upon delivery, I had to refuse to accept. I hope that I will receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JIll McFarlen

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, Too
customer_reviews.text: I could write about this shed all day. It went together so easy and quick by just following directions. Extremely clear instruction and illustration. Can't wait to start transferring my stuff to my own little shed and get the check outta my buddy's way, lol.
customer_reviews.author: GG, Cro-Quiltin

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Storage Shed 5x2 Feet, Sandalwood/Onyx Roof (FG5L1000SDONX)
product_meta.description: Color:Sandalwood| Size:5x2The smart design of the Rubbermaid Plastic Outdoor Storage Shed keeps all of your outdoor supplies out of the way and organized without taking up too much space. Customizable with shelving, racking and pegboards means your belongings are kept organized and easy-to-find. Durably constructed with impact-resistant flooring keeps everything inside protected from the elements. Keep your belongings secure by attaching a lock to the exterior hasp. Shelving and locks sold separately.
feature_bullets: Ideal for long handled tools, outdoor supplies and gas cans
Two-person assembly with common household tools
Tough, double-walled construction and an impact-resistant floor protects items from inclement weather
Will not rot or rust like metal or wood sheds. Leak-resistant, dent-resistant, weather-resistant

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars190 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
